About Us

Christy

The Bride

  • Will tell you what you need to hear
  • Loves a good ab workout
  • Very thoughtful and caring
  • Loves meat, loves seafood even more
  • Scorpio on the inside, Scorpio on the outside

Robinson

The Groom

  • Totally a Cancer (emotion-driven and creative)
  • Weird sense of humour
  • Cares a lot about his family and friends
  • Loves volleyball, gaming and anime too much
  • Can make websites

Our Story

On a night like any other, a girl and a boy began an adventure that would last a lifetime. Robinson “Rob” Lam was out with his boys who happened to stumble their way to Star Bar (also known as “Home” to many). Here he spent his usual time drinking only to spot a dazzling beauty with hair like a glowing sunset. Christy “Candid Queen” Cheung just so happened to be a spitting image of the girl of Rob's dreams. From hopping from bar to bar to Rob's advanced being thwarted by Christy's close friends, the story leads to their first date.

Rob forcefully said he was going to take Christy out and she said okay (as she thought it was just dinner with a new friend). On that first date, Rob agreed to swap dishes with Christy when she changed her mind about the dish she ordered, while Christy challenged Rob to scull the disgusting cocktails they mistakenly ordered. And that was that (well...there was more, but that's between them, maybe get them drunk and see what happens).

The Ceremony

4:00 PM

Depena Reserve, Russell Ave, Dolls Point,
New South Wales, Australia

Ceremony is followed by photographs.
Light afternoon tea will be provided.

The Reception

6:00 PM to 11:00 PM

Georges River Sailing Club
Sanoni Avenue, Sandringham, New South Wales, Australia

There will be canapes and a three-course dinner, as well as music and dancing!

Getting There

Driving

Please park at the car park of Georges River 16ft Sailing Club. The ceremony location is just to the left as you exit the car park towards Peter Depena Reserve.

Georges River Sailing Club Courtesy Bus

An hourly courtesy bus is available from the Georges River Sailing Club for pick ups and drop offs (pick up is free but drop off is $3) within a 5 km radius, i.e. from Kogarah Station. The bus runs from 1 pm to 11 pm. Please call 0410 424 408 to make your own arrangements, or see https://georgesriversailingclub.com.au/ for more information.

Public Transport

There are various buses from nearby stations with stops nearby. Please see https://transportnsw.info/trip/ to organise your trip.
